=== Page 1 ===
Letter of Recommendation
To Whom It May Concern,
It is with great pleasure that I write this letter of recommendation for Mary Castillo,
whom I have had the honor of supervising in research projects and advanced courses
at Peking University. I am confident that Mary will be an outstanding addition to your
PhD program in Computer Science.
During his time at Peking University, Mary has demonstrated exceptional intellectual
curiosity and academic rigor. His GPA of 3.8 reflects his consistent excellence across
all computer science disciplines. What particularly impresses me is his ability to
synthesize complex theoretical concepts with practical applications, showing a deep
understanding of both the theoretical foundations and real-world implications of
computer science.
Mary's research potential is truly remarkable. He has shown exceptional analytical
skills and the ability to identify novel research directions. His programming expertise
and algorithmic thinking have been consistently outstanding, and he has demonstrated
the ability to tackle complex computational problems with innovative approaches.
His work ethic and attention to detail are exemplary, making him an ideal candidate
for research-intensive programs.
Beyond his academic achievements, Mary possesses excellent interpersonal skills and
leadership qualities. His lively personality and collaborative spirit make him an
effective team member, while his independent thinking and problem-solving abilities
allow him to make significant individual contributions. He has shown remarkable
maturity in balancing academic pursuits with personal development.
Mary's dedication to continuous learning and his passion for computer science research
make him an ideal candidate for your PhD program. I am confident that he will not
only excel in his studies but also contribute meaningfully to your research community
and make significant contributions to the field.
I give Mary Castillo my strongest recommendation for your PhD program. He is one of the
most promising students I have had the pleasure of working with, and I am confident
that he will achieve great success in his academic and research career.
Sincerely,
Professor Alex
Department of Computer Science
Peking University
Email: alex.professor@pku.edu.cn
Phone: +86-10-6275-XXXX
